description: With broad bean season going crazy I have plenty, so decided to make a quick easy dip of sorts which came out very nice indeed.
name: Broad Bean Dip Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 few sprigs of fresh mint or coriander

recipeInstructions.text: I made a few batches omitting some ingredients such as the cumin powder and mint, coriander and each has its own special taste flavour.
